function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to limited window openings, increasing the risk of airborne disease spread","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagious diseases spreading among athletes and visitors","Mitigation":"Increase the number of window openings or install a mechanical ventilation system","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Athletes, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Risk of injuries from accidental falls due to uneven walls and varying voids along the track","Impact":"Higher likelihood of injuries and potential transmission of contagious diseases due to falls","Mitigation":"Smooth out the walls and fill the varying voids to create a safer running environment","Technologies":"Wall-smoothing materials, safety padding","People":"Athletes, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Potential for surface contamination on the track flooring leading to the spread of infections","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infections among athletes using the track","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of the track flooring surface","Technologies":"Disinfecting solutions, UV light disinfection systems","People":"Athletes, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building management"}]}
